name: Olija
description: Olija is a game about Faraday's quest, a man shipwrecked then trapped in the mysterious country of Terraphage. Armed with a legendary harpoon, he and other castaways try to leave this hostile country to return to their homelands. Through exploration, narration and combat, the player will discover a strange world and its protagonists, including Olija, an enigmatic lady Faraday is bound to. Inspired by the swashbuckler genre and titles such as Another World and the original Prince of Persia games, Olija is a game about facing the unknown in adversity.
